data.name: Gorytale
data.detailed_description:
Gorytale is a fast-paced adrenaline-rushed FPS shooter set in a peaceful and unaware of impending wrath candy land with tons of excessive violence.

Protagonist – a man who lived a life giving other people pain, suffering and misery upon his death got evaluated by the Allmighty and sent to Hell, specially tailored for him, which turned out to be super sweet place inhabited by overly friendly creatures who don't really know and understand the concept of Evil.

Survive the upcoming hordes of painfully sweet enemies and viciously ravage candy lands!

Game features:
* Indescribably adorable characters and environment
* Ridiculously excessive levels of violence
* Absurd weapons
* Cheesy story
* Lot of one liners
* Banal music

If you happen to enjoy Duke Nukem, Serious Sam, Doom and Quake type of games and enjoy cheesy humor – Gorytale is for You!

data.short_description: Gorytale is a fast-paced, adrenaline-rushed FPS shooter set in a candy land, that is so damn sweet it could be called someone’s Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Game uses meat gibs and blood to represent damage done to enemies
